post.author: fasttimes
post.body: Is there a project to convert D3 into a Tanarus-like online tank game? Can D3 do it? Tanarus was great in the day, and I'd like to see a modern version.

post.author: mavrik65
post.body:
definitely just change the player and associated files, make some cool level models and a couple of maps and
your done. It'll be even better because the physics could allow you to make some great falling building and rubble effects. Oh yeah... also you need to change the enemies to tanks and stuff but it shouldn't be that much of a challenge.

-Mavrik
